content.raw:
Hi Nima, I am working on integrating your action parser to the rest of the code base. My current progress can be seen in the branch jliang_model.

Could you take a look at it, and make the following changes:

1)Make it so that when update() is called, it updates the member variable action.hingeJoints for the each agent.

2) Use the typedef defined in Agent.hh called AgentId instead of initmsg. 

3) Call the addagent and removeagent functions in gamestate when you receive an init or disconnect.
content.html:
Hi Nima, I am working on integrating your action parser to the rest of the code base. My current progress can be seen in the branch jliang_model.

Could you take a look at it, and make the following changes:

1)Make it so that when update() is called, it updates the member variable action.hingeJoints for the each agent.

2) Use the typedef defined in Agent.hh called AgentId instead of initmsg.

3) Call the addagent and removeagent functions in gamestate when you receive an init or disconnect.
